title: Reuters reveals L3Harris nears $4.7 billion deal to acquire Aerojet Rocketdyne
description:
Reuters was first to report that L3Harris Technologies Inc was nearing a $4.7 billion deal to acquire U.S. rocket maker […]

The post Reuters reveals L3Harris nears $4.7 billion deal to acquire Aerojet Rocketdyne appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
